DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to compare the bladder pressure to the gastric pressure in critically ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: The Estimation of Abdominal Pressure by the Bladder and Gastric Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: In critically ill patients, we will measure the gastric pressure by a gastric balloon and the bladder pressure by the intra-vesical pressure to find the optimal method to estimate the abdominal pressure.
DOC.criteria: Critically ill patients during invasive mechanical ventilation Contraindication to measure the bladder pressure
